Title: Login valid
Steps:
1. Open app
2. Enter email
3. Enter password
4. Click Login
Expected Result: User redirected to dashboard; welcome text visible

Title: Login invalid
Steps:
1. Open app
2. Enter email
3. Enter wrong password
4. Click Login

Title: Session persistence
Expected Result: User remains logged in; dashboard visible

Title: Logout
Expected Result: User returned to login page; session cleared

Title: Search by exact title
Steps:
1. Enter 'The Big Lebowski' in search
2. Click Search
Expected Result: Movie card for 'The Big Lebowski' visible; recommendation list present

Title: Search by description
Steps:
1. Enter 'detective looking for missing person'
2. Click Search
Expected Result: Relevant detective movies returned; top 3 relevant

Title: Search by genre
Expected Result: Result list populated with thriller movies; genre tags visible

Title: Nonsense input fallback
Expected Result: UI shows 'No results' or friendly fallback message; no crash

Title: Same query multiple times
Steps:
1. Enter same query 5x with short delay
2. Collect top-3 results each run
Expected Result: Results stable across runs or variance within defined tolerance (e.g., top-3 overlap >= 66%)

Title: Nonexistent movie
Expected Result: UI displays 'No results' message and suggestions

Title: Response latency
Steps:
1. Search for popular movie
2. Measure time from click to results render"

Title: Edge function health
Steps:
1. Send GET to /functions/v1/movie-finder
2. Check headers and status"
Expected Result: 200 or 204 for OPTIONS; CORS headers present; health OK

Title: Loading skeleton present
Expected Result: Loading skeleton visible until results render

Title: Error messaging
Expected Result: User-friendly error message with retry option

Title: History persistence
Expected Result: Last 3 searches visible in History page in order

Title: Authorization header absent
Expected Result: API responds 401 Unauthorized or handles gracefully
